name: Time is Money - Life Simulator
description:
What if TIME was your only currency? Enter a futuristic world where money has lost its value and only time remains - every minute counts! (and it's completely AD FREE)

YEAR 2100

Over the last 100 years, an excess amount of currency was injected into the global economy, resulting in the collapse of the financial system as we knew it. On the eve of a new technological frontier, time became the global currency and society slowly split into different timezones...

Time is Money is a unique, creative, life simulator that explores what life would look like if time was the dominate currency. Start at the bottom and work your way up to the highest levels of society - fighting for survival until your last minute!

• 4 timezones that unlock new skills, items and bonuses

• 15+ traits to improve your skillsets

• 7 skills including TimeKeeper, Founder, Merchant, Thief and more!

• Become a loan shark as you loan out surplus time

• Balance your basic needs strategically

• Invest in businesses that provide steady income

• Buy houses that provide a safe haven

• Save time with various modes of transportation

• Invest and trade items in a daily market

• Gamble away your time or win big

• Manage energy and hunger against dwindling time

• Global leaderboards
